title: "Project page"
---

```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(leaflet)
library(leaflet.extras)

# Read in data
locations <- read_csv(file = here("untitled folder", "locations.CSV.csv"))

# Cleaning and filtering
sites <- locations |>
  select(site_name = location, lat, long) |>
  distinct()

# Create custom icon
blue_dot_icon <- makeIcon(
  iconUrl = here("pics", "liam_dot.png"),
  iconWidth = 30, iconHeight = 30
)

# Initialize map
site_map <- leaflet() |>
  addProviderTiles(providers$Esri.WorldImagery, group = "ESRI World Imagery") |>
  setView(lng = -119.5, lat = 37.25, zoom = 6) |>

  # Add markers
  addMarkers(
    data = sites,
    icon = blue_dot_icon,
    lng = ~long,
    lat = ~lat,
    popup = ~paste(
      "Location:", site_name, "<br>",
      "Coordinates (lat/long):", lat, ",", long
    )
  ) |>

  # Add reset button
  addResetMapButton()

# Print map
site_map

```
